inclusion.criterion: elective orthopedic surgeries of the lower limbs
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: possibility and acceptance of performing the surgical procedure under spinal anesthesia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: acceptance and signature of the informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: subjects who did not understand the Portuguese language
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients who did not agree with the informed consent term and / or did not sign
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients with a history of urological problems
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients who were unable to urinate spontaneously before surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is undergoing treatment, but appears to meet inclusion criteria and does not have any exclusion criteria that would make them ineligible.
